{{Wired embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NSA310 |asin=B005LDM09U |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |type=NAS enclosure |pcb_id=45-402-000073 |flags=fan, RTC w/ battery backup, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8GE-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211DL |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Voltage Monitor;ON Semiconductor;ADT7476;;1;,,, 2A, 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;4;,,, Low Output Dual Voltage Comparator;Diodes Inc;AS393;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.19;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 18;, |tp_firmware=Debian, OpenWrt, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui_eth=00:19:CB, FC:F5:28 }} {{TagLine|NSA310 1-Bay Media Server}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' Kirkwood 88F6281 @1.2GHz *RAM: 456MB DDR2 SDRAM *Storage: 256MB NAND Flash, SATA II, eSATA *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0
===See also=== :;[[List of NAS Devices]] *[[ZyXEL NSA310]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6281 @1.2GHz, 1x SATA II, 1x eSATA *[[ZyXEL NSA310S]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6702 @1GHz, 1x SATA II *[[ZyXEL NSA320]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6281 @1.2GHz, 2x SATA II *[[ZyXEL NSA325]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6282 @1.6GHz, 2x SATA II *[[ZyXEL NSA325 v2]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6282 @1.6GHz, 2x SATA II *[[ZyXEL NAS326]] - ''Marvell'' 88F6810 @1.6GHz, 2x SATA 3.0 *[[ZyXEL NAS520]] - Freescale LS1024 @1.2GHz, 2x SATA 3.0, SDXC *[[ZyXEL NAS540]] - Freescale LS1024 @1.2GHz, 4x SATA 3.0, SDXC *[[ZyXEL NAS542]] - Freescale LS1024 @1.2GHz, 4x SATA 3.0, SDXC
